entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: A few showers or drizzle. High 13 except 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 13 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016
